data.what_is: AIMcrm combines the tools you need most in one easy-to-use interface
data.product_description: AIMcrm combines the tools you need most in one easy-to-use interface

initial_reviews.review_title: AIM CRM is good for tracing user ta like call, email and so on. Good interface to use CRM.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AIMcrm?
AIM CRM is good for use like user tracing data and features like investment data management and use track also good in the report generating like 1 day, month wise.

What do you dislike about AIMcrm?
Sometimes data is not loaded in the CRM and use the dashboard to stuck data records.

What problems is AIMcrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
Please user the dashboard to understand the ui like report and tracing report.

initial_reviews.review_title: Bit skeptical at first but satisfied at the end
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AIMcrm?
Automation are nice, helping with tasks like lead scoring and reports, leaving more time for coffee breaks (or tackling bigger fish). Plus, the mobile-friendly interface and customization options make it a sweet deal.

What do you dislike about AIMcrm?
Setting it up just right can take some effort, and occasionally customer support might feel like it's on island time.

What problems is AIMcrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
It mainly helps out with automating the tasks spread throughout the lead life cycle.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about AIMcrm?
review_question_answers.answer: Automation are nice, helping with tasks like lead scoring and reports, leaving more time for coffee breaks (or tackling bigger fish). Plus, the mobile-friendly interface and customization options make it a sweet deal.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about AIMcrm?
review_question_answers.answer: Setting it up just right can take some effort, and occasionally customer support might feel like it's on island time.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is AIMcrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It mainly helps out with automating the tasks spread throughout the lead life cycle.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AIMcrm?
Sales & Marketing
Although i appreciate the design of AIMcrm, i would like to see it more focused on viewing contact information. The CRM software allows you to add all desired information to each of your contacts, including: websites, account activity, contact history and travel instructions. You can also link contacts to one another and to their respective companies for more efficiency.

What do you dislike about AIMcrm?
AIMcrm has a unique design that is unlike any other CRM software. For some people it may be hard to use. There is a menu bar running across the top of the application that provides access to feature categories such as: Contacts, Account, Settings, Campaigns, Reports and Help. Once one of these categories is selected, a drop-down menu will appear for users to select the tools that they would like to work with. There are also easy to access tools running down the left-hand side of the application that change according to the main category you select, but i guess some people will have difficulties with that.

What problems is AIMcrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
If you plan on stepping up your Sales & Marketing department, AIMcrm will be one of the best CRM software choices for you. Although i feel that the design of other applications provide more efficiency in terms of contact management, AIMcrm provides ease and efficiency in other areas. Although it is not one of our top three products, i still highly recommend this application and suggest users take advantage of their unique features and tools.
